text: {| |} RFA Easedale (A105) was a Dale-class fleet tanker of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary. She was decommissioned on 5 February 1959 and was laid up at Devonport Dockyard. ==References== Category:Dale-class oilers Category:Tankers of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary Category:1941 ships
title: RFA Easedale (A105)
